title: Beauty Bundle: Anti-Aging Skin & Hair Care
description:
RN-made. Plant-powered. Results-driven.
This ultimate natural hair growth and anti-aging trio made by nurses includes our Phytotox Serum, Phytotox Tallow and Mane Magic—three powerful hand made formulas infused with nature’s most effective skin and scalp-rejuvenating herbs, bundled for nearly $8 off.

What’s Inside This Bundle:

Phytotox Serum (2 oz dropper)
Lightweight and fast-absorbing, this oil-based serum is packed with herbal ingredients known as “nature’s botox” for their ability to smooth fine lines, brighten skin, and support collagen production.

Phytotox Tallow (2 oz jar)
A deeply hydrating face salve made with organic, grass-fed tallow and the same powerful herbal extracts as the serum. Use it as a night cream, mask, or daily moisturizer—especially if you struggle with dry or sensitive skin.

Mane Magic (2 oz bottle)
The ultimate nontoxic and natural hair and scalp oil. This deeply nourishing oil is designed to support healthy hair growth, strengthen hair, and restore moisture to dry, damaged strands. Massage into your scalp for 30 minutes up to overnight, or apply to your hair for a moisture-boosting treatment.

Free From:

Petroleum, synthetic fragrance, chemicals, GMOs, and preservatives.

Sustainably Sourced & Handcrafted:

Made in small batches by two RNs (a mother-daughter team!). We locally source our tallow from 100% grass-fed cows. Due to the natural variation of ingredients, texture or scent may vary slightly—but the formula and benefits remain the same.


All sales are final.

These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
